POSTLOGIN.TITLE: You are ready to set up your investment account!

PERSONAL_INFO.TITLE: Personal Information
PERSONAL_INFO.DESCRIPTION: Please choose the profile that best describes you.

ERROR.POSTAL_CODE_DESC: Online Retrieval is not successful due to network issue or host down.
Online Retrieval is not successful due to network issue or host down.

SELECT_NATIONALITY.QUESTION_ONE: Are you a United States Permanent Resident / Tax Resident?
SELECT_NATIONALITY.QUESTION_TWO: Are you a Singaporean Permanent Resident?
SELECT_NATIONALITY.SELECT_NATIONALITY_LAB2: To continue, please tell us what is your nationality

editModalData.modalMessage: We are unable to onboard customers from the selected country online. Please contact our Client Service Team for assistance

editModalData1.modalMessage1: Thank you for your interest in MoneyOwl! Unfortunately, we are currently unable to set up investment accounts for US Citizens, Permanent Residents and Tax Residents.

TAX_INFO.TITLE: Tax Information
TAX_INFO.TAX_MODEL_DESC:
For Singapore Tax Residents, please note that your NRIC/FIN No. is your Taxpayer Identification No.

This is a personal tax account number that has been assigned to you by the country that you are a tax resident of. For more information, please refer to www.oecd.org.
TAX_INFO.TIN_QUESTION: Do you have a Taxpayer Identification Number (TIN) for the above country?

UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.TITLE: Upload Documents
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PAGE_SUB_CAPTION: Help us verify your identity and prevent fraud.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.IDENTITY_VERIFICATION: For identity verifications, upload the required documents.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PROOF_OF_MAILING_SUBTEXT: This document must match the information provided under "Mailing Address" earlier.
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS.PROOF_OF_RESIDENT_SUBTEXT: This document must match the information provided under "Residential Address" earlier.

MAILING_ADDRESS_PROOF.TITLE: Proof Of Mailing Address
MAILING_ADDRESS_PROOF.MESSAGE:
This document must be from a billing organisation and clearly display your name, current mailing address and be dated no more than 90 days prior to today’s date.

You may use utility bills, phone bills, credit card bills etc.

RES_ADDRESS_PROOF.TITLE: Proof Of Residential Address
RES_ADDRESS_PROOF.MESSAGE: This document must be from a billing organisation and clearly display your name, current residential address and be dated no more than 90 days prior to today’s date.You may use utility bills, phone bills, credit card bills etc.

UPLOAD_LATER.TITLE: Upload Documents Later?
UPLOAD_LATER.MESSAGE:
You may save your progress and log in later to upload your verification documents. However, this will delay the set up of your investment account.

Would you like to continue?

UPLOADING_LOADER.TITLE: Uploading
UPLOADING_LOADER.MESSAGE: Please be patient, upload may take a few minutes.

FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED.TITLE: Error !
FILE_SIZE_EXCEEDED.MESSAGE: File of size more than 10 MB is not allowed.

FILE_TYPE_MISMATCH.TITLE: Error !
FILE_TYPE_MISMATCH.MESSAGE: The selected file type is not allowed.

PERSONAL_DECLARATION.TITLE: Personal Declaration
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.PEP_DESC: Also known as a political figure, this person has been entrusted with a prominent role in governing bodies and/or state-owned enterprises.
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.BENEFICIAL_DESC: This person is the decision maker of the investment funds and has full control over the assets.
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.QUESTION1: Are you a Director, Officer, Trading Representative or employee of a SGX Trading Member other than iFAST Financial Pvt Ltd?
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.QUESTION2: Are you a Politically Exposed Person (PEP), close associate of a PEP or family member of a PEP?
PERSONAL_DECLARATION.QUESTION3: Do you have any beneficial owner?

UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS_LATER.TITLE: Upload Documents Later
UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS_LATER.UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS__LATER_PAGE_DESC: Please log in anytime to upload your verification documents and your set up will be complete!

ADDITIONAL_DECLARATIONS_SCREEN_TWO.TITLE: Additional Declarations
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATIONS_SCREEN_TWO.UPLOAD_DOCUMENTS__LATER_PAGE_DESC: Please log in anytime to upload your verification documents and your set up will be complete!
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATIONS_SCREEN_TWO.PERSONAL_SAVINGS: Please indicate the employer that contributed most to your savings:
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATIONS_SCREEN_TWO.INHERITANCE_GIFT: Please indicate from whom you inherited the wealth and the reason for receiving the wealth:

CONFIRM_PORTFOLIO.TITLE: Your Portfolio
CONFIRM_PORTFOLIO.PORTFOLIO_VALUE_FOR: Here's your projected portfolio value for

PROJECTED_RETURNS.TITLE: Projected Returns
PROJECTED_RETURNS.MESSAGE: This is an estimated percentage of gains that the portfolio will achieve. Do note that it is not guaranteed and the actual returns will depend on the actual performance of each asset.

ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION.TITLE: Additional Declarations
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION.PEP_INFO: Please provide the following details for the PEP
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION.PEP_MORE_DETAILS: As you are closely related to/ are a Politically Exposed Person, we need to ask you a few more questions.

ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION_SUBMIT.TITLE: Additional Declarations Submitted
ADDITIONAL_DECLARATION_SUBMIT.DESC: We will get back to you on your application in 1 - 2 working days.

FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.TITLE: Fund Your Account
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.LOGIN_TO_NETBANKING_PAYNOW: Log in to PayNow via internet banking or mobile banking app to make the fund transfer.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.LOGIN_TO_NETBANKING_BANK: Log in to your internet banking or mobile banking app to make the fund transfer.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.TAKE_SCREENSHOT: Take a Screenshot to do it later
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.ADD_REFERENCE_CODE_INFO: To credit the funds to your account, please indicate this reference code in your fund transfer.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.SETUP_AUTO_DEPOSIT_DESC: Hey, you can save time when you set up auto-deposits through your bank! Find out how in the bank transfer details below.
FUND_YOUR_ACCOUNT.PROCESS_TIME_INFO: Your request will be processed within 1 - 2 business days. We will notify you once your portfolio top up has been successful.

OPEN_MODAL_DATA.TITLE: Leave This Page
OPEN_MODAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION:
By signing in to SingPass, information that you have previously entered will be overwritten.

You will be redirected to SingPass MyInfo page. Would you like to proceed?

ERROR_MODAL_DATA.TITLE: Oops, Error!
ERROR_MODAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION: We weren’t able to fetch your data from MyInfo.

FETCH_MODAL_DATA.TITLE: Fetching Data...
FETCH_MODAL_DATA.DESCRIPTION: Please be patient while we fetch your required data from MyInfo.

SING_PASS_CONFIRM.TITLE: The following details have been autofilled into the form.
